title: At the Bottom of the Lake
description: In this Dateline classic, a pilot flees after a deadly plane crash, and becomes a fugitive living a double life for decades. He tells his story to Keith Morrison. Originally aired on NBC on October 12, 2018.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
